name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WindChat - ChatGPT Summary for Hacker News

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WindChat Summary automatically appends a ChatGPT summary to every Hacker News link you come across. 

This means you can quickly get the gist of any article without having to read the entire thing.

The summaries are generated by ChatGPT, which uses the latest natural language processing techniques to provide concise and accurate summaries of any article.
